snippet.title: Battle Train Official Announce Trailer!
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW!! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1708950

Explosive Locomotive Dueling!
Outfit your train, lay down tracks to your enemy's base, and obliterate them with a variety of explosive payloads, natural disasters, and family-friendly taunts.  Unleash your engines in this wildly over the top deck-'n'-track builder. 

The World's Most Popular Game Show
Get to know the colorful cast and crew behind the world's most popular gameshow--BATTLE TRAIN--as you fight through the ranks of champions in your quest for the title of Supreme President Conductor.

Ready?  Let's play some BATTLETRAIN!!!
